text: Known as the White Stalker, Son of Huern and Twin of Ulsdau. Graill is a Werekin of legendary propotions.
Known for his uncontrollable rampage, striking fear into the hearts of enemies and causing chaos on the battlefield.
Known for covering great distances with unearthly grace, closing the gap between enemies or escaping dange.
With keen reflexes and agility, allowing the Werekin to dodge incoming attacks with uncanny speed.
Graill merges seamlessly with the environment, becoming nearly invisible to the naked eye.
Bursts his primal rage into devastating attacks, ignoring enemy defenses and resistances.
His strikes plunges enemies into disarray and confusion as he howls and snarls.
A flurry of razor-sharp claws, tearing through enemy armor and causing bleeding wounds.
With a fierce howl ushered out by their leader the Skin Wolves of the Wolf Tribe burst in to a blood thirsty frenzy.
Twin brother of Ulsdau and legendary warrior of the Wolf Tribe, Graill's known for merging seamlessly with the Naglfari snow.
